response.overview: This is the third installment of the ongoing journey of Larry and Tanner Janesky, a father and son duo, as they take on the Baja 1000. An off-road motorsport race held each year on the Baja California Peninsula.  In 2016, they set out on a new quest, to become the only father and son to finish the Ironman class. Riding separately, but towards the same goal, the Janesky racers battled dangerous conditions over the 1000+ miles of terrain.  This is a story of grits, gut, and determination. Join us on this journey as we continue to ride into the dust.
response.tagline: This is the third installment of the ongoing journey of Larry and Tanner Janesky, a father and son duo, as they take on the Baja 1000.
response.title: Into the Dust 3
